review: He charged higher fees for a filling ... one tooth had a only a small spot which was cleaned nd filing was done for which 1200 was charged .... the other tooth had more decay nd same price was charged .... my daughter was in pain and when i asked the doctor to stop he said the procedure cannot be stopped again and again ....
reply_text:
I would request you to consult other paediatric dentist for the charges. The charges don't vary according to the filling size as the procedure remains the same. She was not in pain but was in fear as fillings don't cause any pain so we advise to finish of the procedure as soon as possible.
Take care
